name: Calculator
description: This calculator application developed in C# using Windows Forms with .NET Framework. The application provides three main functionalities: a Simple Calculator, a Scientific Calculator, and a Currency Converter (in offline mode) using data from a text file.

name: Books Inventory Management System

name: Harry Potter: World of Magic
description: This is a React JS web app that uses PotterDB API for Potions, Books, and Movies, and HP-API for Character info.
